channel.title: Mockup on Phey Hui
channel.description: Recent content in Mockup on Phey Hui

item.title: Envisioning Employee Onboarding Process
item.description: Following up on the new vision of the new staff portal, I have embarked on another journey to define how to improve the employee on-boarding process - taking away all the hardcopy papers and standardising how different departments engage their staff on the first day.

item.title: Envisioning new staff portal
item.description:
How do you like your Staff Portal to be?

This is a question being brought up by my manager and I’m being tasked to do a prototype that how a new Staff Portal can be?
